content: hey I'm DM Scottie welcome to the DMS craft I got a really cool episode for

to make this cable car and just super easy and cheap and it looks great
now one thing in the video I'm only showing one cable car but in reality

use set pieces like this so let's go to it
to start I'm going to make the base of the car so this is the bottom of the

just continue to glue okay now I got all my pieces on there
and we'll move on from there so next what I want to do is reinforce
